title: ENJOINING ORDER ON UNP FROM REMOVING MANUSHA, UPEKSHA FROM PARLIAMENT
content: October 05, 2010: The Colombo District Court issued and enjoining order on the leader of the United National Party (UNP) and its general secretary preventing them from removing MPs Manusha Nanayakkara and Upeksha Swarnamali from parliamentary membership. The order was made considering two petitions submitted by the two members of parliament….
